creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Wesley Clark
description: landscape with large, rolling rocky outcroppings in foreground with hint of a cascading river at R; rounded mountain in middle rises behind pine trees drawn with horizontal brushstrokes; mountain is dotted with trees; lower mountains and pine trees in background; three line inscription at UL; faded relief stamp at R center, square intaglio stamp at UL
markings: ULC, square intaglio seal; R center, rectangular relief (very faint)
title: Landscape
